definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Hails of bottles and bricks were intermittently thrown at police from side streets as reinforcements arrived.
sentences.chinese: 增援的警察到達時從人羣中飛出大量的磚頭和燃燒瓶。

sentences.english: However, the self-made explosives failed to prevent the demolition.
sentences.chinese: 但這些燃燒瓶卻沒有成功阻止拆遷。
